result.heading: A NAZI IRON EAGLE BATTLE FLAG

direction.raw_text: Holy shit. Danny quickly bolts out of his room and into the adjacent bedroom down the hall. He barges through the door. INT. DEREK'S BEDROOM - A NAZI IRON EAGLE BATTLE FLAG It hangs above a serious computer and next to a giant, tome-filled bookshelf. The moans, meanwhile, approach orgasm. TIGHT ON DEREK VINYARD. The young man has a shaved head, a thick goatee, and a well-crafted SWASTIKA on his left tit. On top of Derek in the bed is his barely-of-age girlfriend, STACEY. The covers are completely off and a BLACK ROSE is tattooed across her right shoulder blade. Danny watches her fuck, only for a second.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (softly) Der ! Danny walks over and shakes him. Startled, Derek forcefully grabs his little brother's arm.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (controlled) What? Stacey stops and looks over.  Frustated, she rolls off Derek and onto her side.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Fucking pervert, Dan!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: There's a black guy outside Der... breaking into your car. Derek, muscled and tattooed, jumps out of the bed and quickly puts on his skivvies. He reaches under his mattress, pulls out a SIG .45 semi-automatic pistol, and shoves in a clip.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: How long has he been out there?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Not long. STACEY Who?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Nobody. Relax. Stacey sits up quickly from the bed as Derek pulls on his black combat boots.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Who's out there, Derek?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Not right now, honey. (to Danny) How many?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: One...I think.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Is he strapped?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hunh?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Does he have a fucking gun, Dan?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm not sure.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Is there a driver? Danny nods his head yes. DEREK Okay.  Stay the luck here.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Derek? Be careful. He looks at his girlfriend and walks off. INT. HALLWAY - SAME TIGHT ON DEREK. He walks down the hall. The intensity on his face is alarming. He stops at the front door and grabs the doorknob. Before he turns the knob, he peeks through the eye hole on the door. EXT. HOUSE - DEREK'S EYE POV THE BLACK GUARD carelessly turns toward the driveway to see what's taking his partner so long with the wires. INT. HOUSE - DEREK AT THE DOOR The guard has his back to him. Derek goes. EXT. HOUSE - THE DUEL Derek throws open the door and the black man standing guard wheels and fires a shot into the front door. Derek buries two bullets in his chest.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Fuck you! The force propels the man six feet backwards. INT./EXT. BRONCO - THE OTHER MAN Stunned by the gunfire, he charges back to the getaway Tranny. Derek buries a bullet into his shoulder. The car splits and Derek fires a shot through the side window. He then walks towards the car and fires shot after shot at it until it disappears. INT. VINYARD HOUSEHOLD - DARKNESS Davina and Doris Vinyard yell in the background like they were in Vietnam. They meet in the hallway, still not able to place the direction of the gunfire. DAVINA MOM!!!!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: !  DANNY?! They stay down on the carpet together. EXT. BEDROOM - DANNY'S POV From the rain-soaked window he watches Derek face his wounded prey - crawling on the ground. Sirens sound from a distance.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (O.S.) Get down, Danny! Jesus! TIGHT ON DANNY. His gaze is locked on his brother from his bedroom window. Derek cocks his piece, points it and walks toward the man. TIGHT ON DEREK'S FACE. Eyes blistering. FADE TO BLACK: THREE YEARS LATER EXT. POLICE STATION - EARLY MORNING A black man in a suit and tie, ROBERT SWEENEY, goes through the automatic doors and into the station. He approaches a DESK SERGEANT. A daily calendar on her desk reads MONDAY. MARCH 3. 1997.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Captain Rasmussen?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Briefing room. Down that hall...third door on the left. INT. BRIEFING ROOM - A MEETING Cops and detectives sit attentively and a few sip coffee. The clock on the wall above reads 7:38 AM. Middle-aged with slicked-back hair, CAPTAIN JOHN RASMUSSEN finishes a thought. He spots Sweeney as he enters and aimlessly reaches for a file. RASMUSSEN All right. Moving on-- (acknowledging) Good Morning, Doctor. The group looks over and meets Sweeney's hard glare.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Good morning.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Gentlemen, this is Dr. Bob Sweeney. He's Principal over at Venice High and for some time now he's done a load of outreach work with gangs...in and out of the can. Sweeney nods as Rasmussen cough.  He sips water and continues.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Three years ago a local kid named Derek Vinyard gets sent up for murdering a couple of Crips who were trying to jack his car. Bob taught Vinyard back in high school and has followed the case closely.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He was a skinhead, right?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Derek was more like...the skinhead. He and Cameron Alexander. COP #2 Who? Rasmussen opens a FILE in front of him. There rests Derek's mug shot. He flips it over and reveals CAMMERON'S MUG SHOT. Front and side view.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Cammeron Alexander is probably the biggest writer and distributor of white power literature in LA County. He promotes white power bands, writes reviews, columns, all at the ripe age of forty.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (smiling) He's forty? Jesus.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Pretty clean record...runs everything out of his house down by the beach.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: There weren't any organized white gangs around Venice before those two hooked up. Very few, if any. It was mostly just black and Mexican. But it was tiny. They hit it off though... and Alexander hit the jackpot with Derek. Rasmussen reaches over and pushes play on a VCR.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We got some uncut footage here. Courtesy of NBC. ON THE TELEVISION-- REPORTER Earlier this evening...LA County Firefighter Dennis Vinyard was shot and killed while putting out a fire in a suspected Compton drug den.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (to the group) This being February of '90. EXT. VINYARD HOUSEHOLD - A LIVE BROADCAST - VIDEOTAPE A YOUNGER DEREK, short haired with no tattoos, stands next to the reporter. Derek wears a Venice High Basketball jersey drenched in sweat. Towel around neck, he thinks to himself as the man speaks into the camera.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: To my right I have Lieutenant Vinyard's oldest son Derek. (to Derek) How do you feel about all this, son?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: How do I feel? How do you think I feel? It's typical.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Typical how, Derek?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well...look at our country. It's a haven for criminals. Black...brown... yellow...whatever.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: So you're saying the murder of your father is "race" related?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Every problem in this country is "race" related. Every problem, not just crime. These problems are rooted in the black community, the Hispanic community, the Asian...every non- Protestant group in our society. (then) Look at the shit. Immigration... welfare...AIDS...they're all the problems of the non-white. Look at the statistics.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Most of these issues you're referring to though son are related to--
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (interrupting) No no no! Don't say poverty right now cause that's not it. They're not a product of our fucking environment either! Minorities don't give two shits about this country! They're here to exploit...not embrace.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (O.S) (over reporter's question) When Alexander got his hands on this segment...he copied it, sent it out and it became the Gettysberg Address for hate groups across the country. BACK TO THE TELEVISION.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Millions of white Europeans came to this country and flourished within a generation! A generation! So what the fuck is wrong with these people?!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What does any of this have to do with your father?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Because my father was doing his fucking job! Saving a nigger neighborhood he didn't give two shits about! And he got killed by some drug dealer who still collects a fucking welfare check. Derek looks at the man and walks over to HIS MOTHER DORIS, who smokes a cigarette. The camera follows him as he puts his arm around her and escorts her back inside their Venice Beach residence. The camera pans back to the reporter who just stands there, speechless. INT. BRIEFING ROOM - SAME Rasmussen ejects the tape, the screen turns to fuzz, and he turns it off.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Vinyard was quietly released from Chino on Saturday after three and some odd years. And I think it's something we might want to keep an eye on for a few days.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I don't wanna be an alarmist. But payback is out there. I know it is. And in this particular case...if Vinyard gets popped...more people will get popped.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's not exactly LAPD policy but I want 24-hour surveillance on Vinyard for a few days.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: #2 (smiling in disbelief) Twenty-four hour surveillance, sir?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Just for a few days.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He doesn't sound like Mr. Lovely here, Captain. You want us to bust him or protect him? Rasmussen offers Sweeney a look that it's his question.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I don't think Vinyard's gonna be the one to start anything. It's his following.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Either way...let's keep it low. CUT TO: EXT. VENICE BEACH BOARDWALK - MORNING PEACEFUL DAY by PENNYWISE blasts from Danny's walkman headphones. The day is cloudy and overcast but that doesn't bother the local SURFERS. A twosome paddles north to get a better break on the next set. Danny watches as he skateboards down the strand. His appearance is changed, now resembling a younger, softer Derek. Head shaved to a quarter of an inch, he wears a PLAIN WHITE BACKPACK with punk/white power bands scribbled all over it. Your standard Sex Pistols, DK, Germs, G.B.M., and Adolescents in black. Cro-Magnons and Skrewdriver off to the left. In red is the largest name, DICK NIXON. CUT TO: EXT. VENICE HIGH SCHOOL - THE BIKE CORRAL Kids from all walks of life park their cars, lock their bikes and head off to class. EXT. HALLWAY - TIGHT ON A THRASHED LOCKER Danny throws his SKATEBOARD in, slams the door, and turns to face LIZZY, a pretty, redheaded freshman.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hi Danny.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hey Lizzy. The two smile at one another as the FIRST BELL RINGS.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (to a terrified Daryl) Tellin' Baker I'm fuckin' cheatin'? I've never cheated in my life.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Beat his ass, Henry!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Why you trippin' on me?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I didn't say anything, Henry. I swear.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He's lying, man! I was right there! Little Henry cracks Daryl in the face and practically knocks him down with one shot. A bleeding Daryl struggles to his hands and knees behind Danny.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Next time, man. Danny stares into Henry's eyes and the trio exits. Dannv helps Daryl back up to the sink. THE SECOND BELL RINGS. CUT TO: INT. CLASS - SAME Kids have just settled into their seats.  Danny walks in and tries to be discrete.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: : INT. SCHOOL BATHROOM - A URINAL Danny takes a piss. Outside, a voice pleads "It wasn't me!" DARYL DAWSON, pale and thin, is shoved into the bathroom and he trips into the sink. LITTLE HENRY, a young black kid, enters with two of his buddies. Danny zips up and faces them.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: Vinyard!? An OLDER TEACHER writes an Algebra problem on the board for the students to solve.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You're late. The man grabs a pink slip off his desk and hands it to Danny.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: But it looks like you got bigger problems.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (reading the slip) Oh, man! Come on. Get a job. The teacher stares at him. CUT TO: INT. PRINCIPAL LOBBY - DANNY He sits in a chair next to an office door marked DR. ROBERT SWEENEY - PRINCIPAL. Danny glances at the secretary as she types and talks on the phone. TIGHT ON DANNY. He listens to the conversation through the the crack in the door as his eyes swell.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (O.S.) I do not have a problem with him as an individual, alright!?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (O.S.) Oh shit Murray sure you do.  You hate this kid. INT. OFFICE - THE CONVERSATION The bespectacled, short-haired MURRAY ROSENBERG, 48, looks over and spots Danny listening outside. Murray walks over and shuts the door. He looks at DR. SWEENEY, who now has his jacket off. He points to a typewritten report on the desk and smiles in horror. It is titled BOOK REPORT--MEIN KAMPF. "Daniel Vinvard - American History" is in the upper left hand corner.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: This paper is a travesty, Bob! Arguing for Hitler as a civil rights hero?! You've gotta draw a line.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Murray...it says in your syllabus that they could do their report on any book related to the struggle for Civil Rights.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh come on, Bob!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Let me finish! He needs help...I'm not disputing that. But I read it and I'm not going to throw him out.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: His brother probably put him up to it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I can guarantee you his brother didn't have anything to do with it, Murray. Murray sighs and takes off his glasses.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Don't let him walk scot-free here. For his sake...not mine. You might be all he has left. Sweeney stares at the younger teacher and nods. CUT TO: EXT. OFFICE - THE DOOR OPENS Murray walks out and turns back to Sweeney.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Thanks, Bob.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Okay. Get in here, Dan! Danny and Murray make hostile eye contact.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I knew it was you.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (O.S.) Shut up and get your ass in here! INT. OFFICE - DANNY ENTERS Before he even gets through the door he's chastised.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What's it gonna be, Dan?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What's what going to be?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: This petty shit you're pullin'.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well...I don't know.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You said it, all right. Sit down. Danny does what he's told. Sweeney stares at the teenager and leans back in his chair.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Are you okay?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Any time you wanna talk, Dan--
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Okay.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: How's Derek?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Fine.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Adjusting okay?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He was a student of mine. Honors English. He was a great student... like you...but he hung out with scumbags. Also like you. That's why he ended up in the pen, hunh? No answer. Sweeney holds up Danny's paper.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Great writing. I can't correct it though. It wreaks too much of shit.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Come on, man! I followed directions and wrote an "A" paper. It's got nothing to do with Derek.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Everything you do now has something to do with Derek. Who told you to do this?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Let us get on with our lives, man!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hey, I'm not worried about Derek--he can take care of himself.  I'm worried about his little brother. (softly) Mein Kampf, Dan? I should expel you!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Do it. What?  You don't think I could handle it?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (smiling in disbelief) The street would kill you, Danny. You're not tough. The second a brother pulls a gun on your ass you'll be holierin' for Doris. (pondering to himself) So here's the drill. Take it or leave it cause I'm sick of babysitting. I'm your history teacher from here on out. We're gonna deal with shit happening right now. Call it American History...X. I see your ass once a day. Any more, any less, and you're a memory at Venice High. Clear?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It took me a week to read Mein Kampf. Come on, Sweeney.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: My name is Dr. Sweeney. And I want a another paper on my desk tomorrow.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What am I doing it on then?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It'S not a "what", it's a "who." (after a beat) Derek. SMASH TO: EXT. VENICE SHORELINE - LATE AFTERNOON A series of intercuts shows activity in and around the pier. A HOMELESS LATINO MAN searches a trash dumpster. OPEN VENDORS sell tie-dye and water bong paraphernalia. A FAT WOMAN walks past eating a hot dog. BLACK GANG MEMBERS play basketball in their low-rider shorts and boxers. TIGHT ON DANNY. He skateboards down the boardwalk, performing tricks and spinning the board. He eats shit, recovers, and looks off into the distance.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: People look at me...and they see my brother. That's how things have gone since the murder of our father. EXT. BOARDWALK - NEAR THE BASKETBALL COURT From afar, he spots a group of black gang members shoot hoops. He and Little Henry from earlier exchange a cold glance.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Little Henry Hastings and his older brother Jerome. Jerome's a Shoreline Crip...Henry's on his way. Little Henry and older brother JEROME catch their breath and stare down Dan. Danny doesn't flinch. Jerome sips from a 40 oz. beer and resumes playing.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Venice Beach, man. It didn't always look like this. I mean...our Dad used to take us down here to run...and it was cool. Derek fucking owned this place.        Since then though...the gangs, man-- TIGHT ON DANNy. He watches the basketball action as he takes a drag off his Marlboro Red.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: --they've moved west from Inglewood and South Central and have really just...taken over. Especially at my high school. The Venice Locos are big too but they hang out in bumluck Mar Vista. It's scary. (then) And then there's The Disciples of Christ. The D.O.C. Jerome and Little Henry joke and argue with eight extra players and spectators. DISSOLVE TO: EXT. BASKETBALL COURT - A GAME - FLASHBACK DANNY'S POV. The teams are a mixed assemblage of 3 blacks and 2 Latinos and 3 whites and 1 black and 1 Latino. SKINHEAD FAT SETH RYAN, early twenties, and his two skinhead buddies, can't compete against the better, predominantly black team. One of the skins, CURTIS, has a shaved head, a light beard and an M-16 RIFLE tattooed on his head. JEROME and LITTLE HENRY sit together to the right of the court and monitor closely. Danny looks over his left shoulder and sees Derek and Stacey sit with CAMMERON. Cowboy hat and BRONCO JERSEY, they sit and converse on the bleachers.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Seven-six. Let's go!  Set some picks!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Bring it on, boy. Derek quickly moves his eyes to the court. LAWRENCE Boy? Lawrence quickly pivots past Seth, dunks it, and yells as he hangs on the rim. The crowd cheers.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Lucky piece of shit! I'm through "monkeying" around with your ass! Lawrence spins around and challenges Seth.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Fat, pasty, pale, pastrami eating, cracker, motherfucker. A hundred bucks says I make you my bitch.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (to the crowd) Here we go! Trying to make ends meet for that cut in welfare. He makes a scene and passes Danny on the sideline. Lawrence waits for Seth to take it further. Danny looks at him, concerned.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's eight-six, Seth.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: When I want your fucking opinion I'll ask for it, fuckhead. (to Derek and Cam) Help me cover here, guys. Derek and Cameron stare at Seth, knowing Seth will lose and embarrass them.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You got a big fucking mouth, fat kid.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'll take this negro down.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You can't take a shit, Seth.  Shut up. Derek shoots a look to Cameron, comes to a decision, and stands. He shouts for all to hear.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I got a bet. Lawrence stares at him, sensing something harder.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I come in, same score now, first one to eleven. Black boys against the white boys. Lawrence looks back to his boys in disbelief.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Name your price, Cracker.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No money...for the court. We win, you grab your shit and find a different place to run. Not just today... forever. You win, and we don't come back. No hitching, no fighting, here in front of everyone. Six-eight, our ball. The action around the court gets very still.  Finally, Lawrence nods.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You got a lot of fucking balls, man. Bring it. Right now. Derek pulls off his sweatshirt and gives it to Stacey. Lawrence gets his team together. CUT TO: EXT. COURT - BLACK VERSUS WHITE No more mixed assemblage of players.  One team is white, one team is black. A SERIES OF SMOTS Derek blows by Lawrence for a left handed layup. Derek hits a thirty looter. Curtis grabs a rebound and uses his elbows to get defenders off him. Big Lawrence fouls Derek hard and Derek stares at him. Big Lawrence makes a twenty foot turnaround. Lawrence advances on a three on two and dunks it. Derek pump fakes three times and uses the glass for a deuce. Finally, Derek drives the lane and dishes to Seth at the last minute for a bucket.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes! Ten a piece! Nice fucking dish. SETH and CURTIS slap Derek's hand as they get back on transition. Derek stares at Lawrence. CAMMERON watches intently.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's all you, Der!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Fuckin' BYU, man!  All right!  All we need is one now! Lawrence and Derek lock eyes, a look exceeding competitive boundary. A look filled with rage.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Use that fat ass and keep him out, Seth! Seth and the opposing player bang to get position underneath.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I ain't losin' in my house!  Clear it out! The POWER FORWARD dribbles beautifully up the court -- his teammates clearing out the key. Defensively, Derek is solid. He tries to pass Derek but Derek's defense is stifling. Again. With another tricky move, Lawrence inadvertently puts his LEFT ELBOW into Derek's face, sending him quickly to the pavement. EVERYBODY STOPS.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That's fuckin' offense!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Get the fuck outta here!  He was movin' his feet! Derek, teeth bloodied, rises. The two have a stare down.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (threateningly) I'll go if you want to.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You wanna piece! Bring it! Players quickly rush to restrain the two even though the teams hate each other.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: If you wanna go...I'm ready.  Don't be throwin' fuckin' elbows.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Fuck you! Derek walks over to Cammeron, Danny and Stacey standing courtside. She has a water bottle and a towel waiting for him. He wipes his BLOODY LIP and takes a sip. Cameron stares at Derek.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hey.  Are you copacetic? Derek nods and looks at Danny and Stacey.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He's gonna do that 180 spin move.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I know what he's gonna do.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You gotta call offense on that shit.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Not on point game you don't.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Fuck that, D. That chucker can't pull that shit. It's fucking-
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Not on point, honey. He turns back to the court and walks over to Lawrence. He stands in front of him and checks the ball in. DEREK Tens! Lawrence takes the ball, passes it to the wing, and quickly gets it back. Lawrence dribbles up top, makes a marvelous 180 spin with the ball, and pulls up for a ten foot jumper. Derek reads it perfectly and REJECTS IT. Lawrence trips to the ground, Derek grabs the ball off the fast break and DUNKS IT.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (amazed by the dunk) Holy shit! Everybody courtside goes nuts. Derek walks to the sideline, ignoring all the hand slaps being offered. Everyone is riveted on Derek.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (to the other team) Get off my  fucking court!  This is my house!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah! Fuck...yeah! A sweaty Derek pulls his little brother close. He takes a drink of water, spits out more blood, looks at his bitter opponent, and says nothing. CUT TO: EXT. STREET - BY THE COURT Derek, Danny, Seth, Cammeron, Curtis and Stacey stand outside the Bronco. The doors are all open and the stereo softly plays music in the b.g. Derek dries off. DANNY'S POV. Derek throws a shirt and tie over his sweaty, tattooed body. Danny watches the tats disappear, and it's almost like his brother is normal. A name tag reads LA COPY CENTER - DEREK - ASSISTANT MANAGER. Derek looks at JEROME and LAWRENCE from afar. Danny notices the two men stare at his brother, ready to kill. Derek meets their gaze. CUT TO: EXT. VENICE BOARDWALK - PRESENT - DANNY'S POV Danny awakens from his daydream. The black players now stare at him. Danny puts his board down and skates down the boardwalk.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It was only the beginning. (then) Derek once told me that minorities would take America over one day. That white people are too afraid. Maybe he was right. CUT TO: EXT. SMALL BEACH HOUSE - A PATIO Danny skates up to the gate and kicks his board up to his hand.  He passes two SURFBOARDS on his way towards the back. EXT. SIDE ENTRANCE - TWO 14-YEAR-OLDS LIZZY, the redhaired beauty from earlier, and her blond friend KAMMI, sturable out and laugh. They're stoned.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hey! Danny!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (smiling) Hey.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You're going tonight, right? DANNY Where?
